List of All Books - {{nbBooks}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-book-list', templateUrl: './book-list.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class BookListComponent implements OnInit { nbBooks: number=2; books=[{ id:"11", title: "dummy title 1", description:"dummy description", imageURL:"https://picsum.photos/200/300", },{ id:"11", title: "dummy title 1", description:"dummy description", imageURL:"https://picsum.photos/200/300", } ] constructor(){ } ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } }
